mapper.select: SELECT SCHEDULE.*, MOVIE.MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE.MOVIE_TYPE, MOVIE.MOVIE_RELEASEDATE, MOVIE.MOVIE_SCREENTIME, MOVIE.MOVIE_STATUS, MOVIE.MOVIE_RATING, MOVIEROOM.BRANCH_NUMBER, MOVIEROOM.MOVIEROOM_NAME, MOVIEROOM.MOVIEROOM_2D, MOVIEROOM.MOVIEROOM_3D, MOVIEROOM.MOVIEROOM_4D, BRANCH.BRANCH_NAME FROM TBL_SCHEDULE SCHEDULE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MOVIE_NUMBER, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_TYPE, MOVIE_RELEASEDATE, MOVIE_SCREENTIME, MOVIE_STATUS, MOVIE_RATING FROM TBL_MOVIE ) MOVIE ON SCHEDULE.MOVIE_NUMBER = MOVIE.MOVIE_NUMBER LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MOVIEROOM_NUMBER, BRANCH_NUMBER, MOVIEROOM_NAME, MOVIEROOM_2D, MOVIEROOM_3D, MOVIEROOM_4D FROM TBL_MOVIEROOM ) MOVIEROOM ON SCHEDULE.MOVIEROOM_NUMBER = MOVIEROOM.MOVIEROOM_NUMBER LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BRANCH_NUMBER, BRANCH_NAME FROM TBL_BRANCH ) BRANCH ON BRANCH.BRANCH_NUMBER = MOVIEROOM.BRANCH_NUMBER WHERE SCHEDULE_NUMBER = #{scheduleNumber}
